# Creating Templates

Step-by-step guide to creating professional broadcast templates.

## Quick Start

1. Click **+ New Template** in the Layers panel
2. Enter a template name
3. Select a layer (determines z-order)
4. Start adding elements

## Template Settings

### Canvas Size

Templates inherit project canvas dimensions:
- 1920×1080 (HD)
- 3840×2160 (4K)
- Custom dimensions

### Layer Assignment

Assign templates to layers for compositing:
- Layer 1: Lower thirds (front)
- Layer 2: Bugs/logos
- Layer 3: Full screens
- Layer 4: Backgrounds (back)

## Building Your Template

### 1. Background

Start with background elements:
- Shape for solid background
- Image for texture/pattern
- Gradient for visual interest

### 2. Structure

Add structural elements:
- Container shapes
- Divider lines
- Accent elements

### 3. Content

Add content elements:
- Text for names/titles
- Images for photos/logos
- Icons for visual indicators

### 4. Animation

Create animations for each phase:
- IN: How elements enter
- LOOP: Continuous animation (optional)
- OUT: How elements exit

## Template Best Practices

### Design

- Follow brand guidelines
- Maintain safe areas
- Ensure readability

### Performance

- Limit element count
- Optimize images
- Test animations

### Reusability

- Use content fields
- Document field purposes
- Test with various content
